statements: SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData;
SELECT IndividualName, ScanDate FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE ID = 1;
SELECT ID, ScanDate FROM RetinaScanningData ORDER BY ScanDate DESC;
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE IndividualName = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT AVG(ID) AS AvgID, COUNT(*) AS TotalRecords FROM RetinaScanningData;
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE ID > 100 ORDER BY IndividualName DESC, ScanDate ASC
SELECT IndividualName, EyeScanData FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE ScanDate BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY ID
SELECT EyeScanData, ID, IndividualName FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE IndividualName LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY ScanDate DESC
SELECT ID, IndividualName FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE EyeScanData IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ID ASC
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE IndividualName = 'Alice' ORDER BY ScanDate DESC
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData;
SELECT eye_scan_id, matching_score FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE matching_score > 0.8;
SELECT image_data, id FROM RetinaScanningData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CriminalCases WHERE crime_type = 'Murder';
SELECT case_id, suspect_id, investigation_status FROM CriminalCases WHERE investigation_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE id = 1
SELECT eye_scan_id, matching_score FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE matching_score > 0.75 ORDER BY matching_score DESC
SELECT image_data FROM RetinaScanningData WHERE eye_scan_id = 'xyz123' AND matching_score > 0.6
SELECT * FROM CriminalCases WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' AND investigation_status = TRUE
SELECT suspect_id, count(*) as total_cases FROM CriminalCases GROUP BY suspect_id HAVING count(*) > 3
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanData;
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_photo FROM CriminalRecords WHERE criminal_id = 1;
SELECT scan_id, eye_color FROM RetinaScanData ORDER BY eye_color ASC;
SELECT criminal_id, criminal_name FROM CriminalRecords ORDER BY criminal_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MatchedResults WHERE scan_id = 3 AND criminal_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM RetinaScanData;
SELECT scan_id, eye_color FROM RetinaScanData WHERE eye_color = 'brown';
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_photo FROM CriminalRecords WHERE criminal_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT m.match_id, r.eye_color, c.criminal_name FROM MatchedResults m JOIN RetinaScanData r ON m.scan_id = r.scan_id JOIN CriminalRecords c ON m.criminal_id = c.criminal_id;

SELECT r.scan_id, r.eye_color, c.criminal_name FROM RetinaScanData r LEFT JOIN MatchedResults m ON r.scan_id = m.scan_id LEFT JOIN CriminalRecords c ON m.criminal_id = c.criminal_id WHERE c.criminal_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM RetinaScans;
SELECT person_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM Persons ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT case_id, case_description FROM CriminalCases WHERE case_description LIKE '%murder%';
SELECT rs.scan_id, p.full_name, cc.case_description FROM RetinaScans rs JOIN Persons p ON rs.person_id = p.person_id JOIN CriminalCases cc ON p.person_id = cc.suspect_id;
SELECT s.suspect_id, p.full_name, c.case_description FROM Suspects s JOIN Persons p ON s.person_id = p.person_id JOIN CriminalCases c ON s.case_id = c.case_id ORDER BY c.case_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM Persons ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT person_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM Persons WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT rs.scan_id, rs.person_id, p.full_name FROM RetinaScans rs JOIN Persons p ON rs.person_id = p.person_id;
SELECT cc.case_id, cc.case_description, p.full_name AS suspect_name FROM CriminalCases cc JOIN Suspects s ON cc.case_id = s.case_id JOIN Persons p ON s.person_id = p.person_id;
SELECT * FROM RetinaScans WHERE scan_id IN (SELECT scan_id FROM RetinaScans WHERE person_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000') ORDER BY scan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM eye_scans;
SELECT criminal_name, crime_details FROM criminals WHERE criminal_id = 5;
SELECT investigator_name, department FROM investigators ORDER BY investigator_id DESC;
SELECT criminal_name, crime_details FROM criminals WHERE crime_details LIKE '%murder%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM matches;
SELECT * FROM eye_scans;
SELECT criminal_name, crime_details FROM criminals WHERE criminal_id = 1;
SELECT investigator_name, department FROM investigators ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT eye_scan_id, person_id FROM eye_scans WHERE person_id > 100 ORDER BY eye_scan_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM matches JOIN criminals ON matches.criminal_id = criminals.criminal_id JOIN eye_scans ON matches.eye_scan_id = eye_scans.eye_scan_id;
